Articles.Content:
I am new to KSP and watched a nice you tube on how to play but still have yet to orbit or remember to put the parachute in the right place!

looking forward to getting to know you all

Richard

Welcome, Richard!

Making orbit is the first, biggest step. There is a very helpful and friendly community here if you need assistance.

Happy landings!
Welcome aboard! Forgetting things doesn't quite go away... I remember a Dunar mission I had launched awhile back that I managed to forget the batteries on! That was a tricky mission.

Hi, welcome to the forums!

Everyone will like you, so just know that and we hope you enjoy your stay.
